name: WC return products
author: wc expert

sections.description:
Return product by WooCommerce customer from front end

Introduction

Return product by WooCommerce customer from front end

  • Return products of an order individually from front end.
  • Get return details for admin on order page

How to setup?

After the installation, Place an order, select products from order page and return.

Tutorial / Manual
sections.installation:
1. Upload the plugin folder to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory.
  2. Activate the plugin through the Plugins menu in WordPress.
  3. That’s it! you can now configure the plugin.
sections.faq:
Installation Instructions

  1. Upload the plugin folder to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory.
  2. Activate the plugin through the Plugins menu in WordPress.
  3. That’s it! you can now configure the plugin.

Does this support latest WooCommerce?

Yes. This plugin supports WC 3.0 and greater.
sections.changelog:
1.0.1

  • Fix: Replacing already returned products on multiple products return

1.0.0

  • Initial version
